snippet: The Justice Department said Tuesday that it intended to file additional charges against Ahmed Abu Khattala, the man being held in the 2012 attacks that killed the United States ambassador in Benghazi, Libya, and three others.
abstract: Justice Dept intends to file additional charges against Ahmed Abu Khattala, suspected leader of the 2012 attack on American Consulate in Benghazi, and three others.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department said Tuesday that it intended to file additional charges against Ahmed Abu Khattala, the man being held in the 2012 attacks that killed the United States ambassador in Benghazi, Libya, and three others.

headline.main: More Charges to Come Against Libyan Over Benghazi
headline.print_headline: More Charges to Come Against Libyan Over Benghazi
